citations.narrative:
The facility does not currently maintain records fully documenting the acquisition and disposition of regulated animals.
This includes acquisition information for birds on the premises and notation for the loss of 3 chickens and 1 silver fox
approximately 1 month prior to inspection. These records are needed to facilitate the tracking of, as well as assure the
legal acquisition, disposition, proper care, and handling of, such animals. The facility must make, keep, and maintain
records disclosing the required information pertaining to the acquisition and death or disposition of animals used for
regulated activity.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)  Repeat
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The facility does not currently maintain records fully documenting the acquisition and disposition of regulated animals. 
This includes acquisition information for birds on the premises and notation for the loss of 3 chickens and 1 silver fox 
approximately 1 month prior to inspection. These records are needed to facilitate the tracking of, as well as assure the 
legal acquisition, disposition, proper care, and handling of, such animals. The facility must make, keep, and maintain 
records disclosing the required information pertaining to the acquisition and death or disposition of animals used for 
regulated activity. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
